 57m2 Apartment
 Gudauri, Georgia, Europe
 Property Features 
• located on 3rd floor in 7 storey condo-apartment block so called Penta Invest apart-building

• two balconies, facing North and South 
• constructed in 2004 
• central heating, uninterrupted power 
• in house restaurant and ski room on ground floor 
• ski in / out 
• 3 story 15 room hotel at foots of the building
Amenities

• great vacation or rental property. 
• Hotel vicinity provides extra services: laundry, business center
